https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/lhgulQ8D1BOpnmO3NbN1n4ZNXz1.jpg "Behadd" reflects upon the relationship dynamics of a 'Parent' and a 'Child', and shows how their love for one another becomes the cause of their heartache and the reflection of 'selflessness' verses 'selfishness' in Love. Behadd
